title: [VSM] High-Level Plan: How VSM Wins
description:
Task 1. Become better than openclaw and similar tools. But stay as a Claude
code extension system for maximum interoperability. Find out what people
are using openclaw for, build up a backlog.

For me, I want a developer workstation. A place to manage all of my work,
including the agents I interact with.

Become a useful internet citizen. Anticipate what I'm interested in. An AI
computer isn't passively waiting instructions.

-----------------------------
Michael Darmousseh


On Sat, Feb 14, 202
subject: [VSM] High-Level Plan: How VSM Wins
